import React from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { createStructuredSelector } from 'reselect' import { selectCartItems, selectCartTotal} from '../../redux/cart/cart.selectors' import { } from '../../components/checkout-item/checkout-item.component' import './checkout.style.scss' const CheckoutPage = ({cartItems, total}) => (
Product
Description
Quantity
Price
Remove
{cartItems.map(cartItem => cartItem.name)}
${total}
) const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector({ cartItems: selectCartItems, total: selectCartTotal }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(CheckoutPage)
